title.rendered: The Southeast Company Splashes Steal Duffle Bag

content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1483450676352{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]Pack up everything you need with this trendy California Splashes Steal Duffel bag.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][stm_icon_list list_type=”font” title=”fa fa-check”]

  • Material: 100% Polyester
  • Large zippered main bag
  • A wrap-around zipper keeps bag compressed for convenient storage
  • Removable, adjustable shoulder strap
  • Small zippered front pocket
  • Two carry handles on sides
  • When open there are two additional carry handles with hook and loop closure wrap on top
  • Wipe clean with a damp cloth

[/stm_icon_list][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][stm_icon_list list_type=”font” title=”fa fa-check”]

  • Zippered mesh pocket on one side
  • Zippered solid pocket on other side
  • Folded flat measures approximately 11″ x 12″ x 2″
  • Fully open measures approximately 11″ x 12″ x 28″
  • Heat-sealed graphics
  • Officially licensed
  • Imported
  • Brand: The Northwest Company

[/stm_icon_list][/vc_column][/vc_row]

excerpt.rendered: Pack up everything you need with this trendy California Splashes Steal Duffel bag.
